   18: %% %CopyrightEnd%
   19: %%
   20: -module(file_sorter_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(format(S, A), io:format(S, A)).
   26: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   27: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   28: -define(privdir(_), "./file_sorter_SUITE_priv").
   29: -else.
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   32: -define(privdir(Conf), proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   33: -endif.
   34: 
   35: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   36: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, basic/1, badarg/1, 
   37: 	 term_sort/1, term_keysort/1,
   38: 	 binary_term_sort/1, binary_term_keysort/1,
   39: 	 binary_sort/1, 
   40: 	 term_merge/1, term_keymerge/1, 
   41: 	 binary_term_merge/1, binary_term_keymerge/1,
   42: 	 binary_merge/1,
   43: 	 term_check/1, term_keycheck/1,
   44: 	 binary_term_check/1, binary_term_keycheck/1,
   45: 	 binary_check/1,
   46: 	 inout/1, misc/1, many/1]).
   47: 
   48: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   59: 
   60: all() -> 
   61:     [basic, badarg, term_sort, term_keysort,
   62:      binary_term_sort, binary_term_keysort, binary_sort,
   63:      term_merge, term_keymerge, binary_term_merge,
   64:      binary_term_keymerge, binary_merge, term_check,
   65:      binary_term_keycheck, binary_term_check,
   66:      binary_term_keycheck, binary_check, inout, misc, many].
   67: 
   68: groups() -> 
   69:     [].
   70: 
   71: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   75:     ok.
   76: 
   77: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: 
   84: %% Basic test case.
   85: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     Fmt = binary,
   87:     Arg = {format,Fmt},
   88:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
   89:     P0 = pps(),
   90: 
   91:     F1s = [F1] = to_files([[]], Fmt, Config),
   92:     ok = file_sorter:sort(F1),
   93:     [] = from_files(F1, Fmt),
   94:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(17, F1),
   95:     [] = from_files(F1, Fmt),
   96:     ok = file_sorter:merge(F1s, Foo),
   97:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
   98:     delete_files(Foo),
   99:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(17, F1s, Foo),
  100:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  101:     delete_files([Foo | F1s]),
  102: 
  103:     [F2] = to_files([[foo,bar]], Fmt, Config),
  104:     ok = file_sorter:sort([F2], F2, Arg),
  105:     [bar,foo] = from_files(F2, Fmt),
  106:     delete_files(F2),
  107: 
  108:     Fs1 = to_files([[foo],[bar]], Fmt, Config),
  109:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo, Arg),
  110:     [bar,foo] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  111:     delete_files(Foo),
  112:     ok = file_sorter:merge(Fs1, Foo, Arg),
  113:     [bar,foo] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  114:     delete_files([Foo | Fs1]),
  115: 
  116:     Fmt2 = binary_term,
  117:     Arg2 = {format, Fmt2},
  118:     [F3] = to_files([[{foo,1},{bar,2}]], Fmt2, Config),
  119:     ok = file_sorter:keysort([2], [F3], F3, Arg2),
  120:     [{foo,1},{bar,2}] = from_files(F3, Fmt2),
  121:     delete_files(F3),
  122: 
  123:     Fs2 = to_files([[{foo,1}],[{bar,2}]], Fmt2, Config),
  124:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(1, Fs2, Foo, Arg2),
  125:     [{bar,2},{foo,1}] = from_files(Foo, Fmt2),
  126:     delete_files(Foo),
  127:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(1, Fs2, Foo, Arg2),
  128:     [{bar,2},{foo,1}] = from_files(Foo, Fmt2),
  129:     delete_files([Foo | Fs2]),
  130: 
  131:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  132: 
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: %% Call functions with bad arguments.
  136: badarg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  137:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
  138:     BadFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "not_a_file"),
  139:     ABadFile = filename:absname(BadFile),
  140:     file:delete(BadFile),
  141:     {error,{file_error,ABadFile,enoent}} =
  142: 	file_sorter:sort(BadFile),
  143:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  144: 	(catch file_sorter:sort({flipp})),
  145:     {error,{file_error,ABadFile,enoent}} =
  146: 	file_sorter:keysort(1, BadFile),
  147:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  148: 	(catch file_sorter:keysort(1, {flipp})),
  149: 
  150:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  151: 	(catch file_sorter:merge([{flipp}],foo)),
  152:     {error,{file_error,ABadFile,enoent}} =
  153: 	file_sorter:keymerge(1,[BadFile],foo),
  154:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  155: 	(catch file_sorter:keymerge(1,[{flipp}],foo)),
  156:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, _}, _}} =
  157: 	(catch file_sorter:merge(fun(X) -> X end, foo)),
  158:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, _}, _}} =
  159: 	(catch file_sorter:keymerge(1, fun(X) -> X end, foo)),
  160: 
  161:     {error,{file_error,ABadFile,enoent}} =
  162: 	file_sorter:check(BadFile),
  163:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  164: 	(catch file_sorter:check({flipp})),
  165:     {error,{file_error,ABadFile,enoent}} =
  166: 	file_sorter:keycheck(1, BadFile),
  167:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  168: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(1, {flipp})),
  169:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  170: 	(catch file_sorter:check([{flipp}],foo)),
  171:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  172: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(1,[{flipp}],foo)),
  173:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, _}, _}} =
  174: 	(catch file_sorter:check(fun(X) -> X end, foo)),
  175:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, _}, _}} =
  176: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(1, fun(X) -> X end, foo)),
  177: 
  178:     Fs1 = to_files([[1,2,3]], binary_term, Config),
  179:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, flipp}, _}} =
  180: 	(catch file_sorter:check(Fs1 ++ flipp, [])),
  181:     [F1] = Fs1,
  182:     {error,{file_error,_,_}} =
  183:         file_sorter:sort(Fs1, foo, [{tmpdir,F1},{size,0}]),
  184:     delete_files(Fs1),
  185:     Fs2 = to_files([[1,2,3]], binary_term, Config),
  186:     {error,{file_error,_,enoent}} = 
  187: 	file_sorter:sort(Fs2, foo, [{tmpdir,filename:absname(BadFile)},
  188:                                     {size,0}]),
  189:     delete_files(Fs2),
  190: 
  191:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, bad}, _}} =
  192: 	(catch file_sorter:check([], [{format,term} | bad])),
  193:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, [{flipp}]}, _}} =
  194: 	(catch file_sorter:check([{flipp}])),
  195:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  196: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(1, {flipp})),
  197:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, [{flipp}]}, _}} =
  198: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(2, [{flipp}])),
  199:     {error,{file_error,_,eisdir}} = file_sorter:keycheck(1, []),
  200:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch file_sorter:keycheck(kp, [])),
  201:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} =
  202: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck([1, kp], [])),
  203:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} =
  204: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck([1 | kp], [])),
  205:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, []}, _}} = (catch file_sorter:keycheck([], [])),
  206:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {format, foo}}, _}} =
  207: 	(catch file_sorter:check([], {format,foo})),
  208:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, not_an_option}, _}} =
  209: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(7, [], [not_an_option])),
  210:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, format}, _}} =
  211: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(1, [], [{format, binary}])),
  212:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, order}, _}} =
  213: 	(catch file_sorter:keycheck(1, [], [{order, fun compare/2}])),
  214: 
  215:     do_badarg(fun(I, O) -> file_sorter:sort(I, O) end,
  216: 	      fun(Kp, I, O) -> file_sorter:keysort(Kp, I, O) end,
  217: 	      BadFile),
  218:     do_badarg_opt(fun(I, O, X) -> file_sorter:sort(I, O, X) end,
  219: 		  fun(Kp, I, O, X) -> file_sorter:keysort(Kp, I, O, X)
  220: 		  end),
  221:     do_badarg(fun(I, O) -> file_sorter:merge(I, O) end,
  222: 	      fun(Kp, I, O) -> file_sorter:keymerge(Kp, I, O) end,
  223: 	      BadFile),
  224:     do_badarg_opt(fun(I, O, X) -> file_sorter:merge(I, O, X) end,
  225: 		  fun(Kp, I, O, X) -> file_sorter:keymerge(Kp, I, O, X)
  226: 		  end).
  227: 
  228: do_badarg(F, KF, BadFile) ->
  229:     [Char | _] = BadFile,
  230:     AFlipp = filename:absname(flipp),
  231:     {error,{file_error,AFlipp,enoent}} = F([flipp | flopp], foo),
  232:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {foo,bar}}, _}} = (catch F([], {foo,bar})),
  233:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, Char}, _}} = (catch F(BadFile, [])),
  234:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} = (catch F({flipp}, [])),
  235: 
  236:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, Char}, _}} = (catch KF(1, BadFile, [])),
  237:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} = (catch KF(1, {flipp}, [])),
  238:     {error,{file_error,AFlipp,enoent}} =
  239: 	KF(2, [flipp | flopp], foo),
  240:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {foo,bar}}, _}} = (catch KF(1, [], {foo,bar})),
  241:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch KF(kp, [], foo)),
  242:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch KF([1, kp], [], foo)),
  243:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch KF([1 | kp], [], foo)),
  244:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, []}, _}} = (catch KF([], [], foo)),
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: do_badarg_opt(F, KF) ->
  248:     AFlipp = filename:absname(flipp),
  249:     {error,{file_error,AFlipp,enoent}} =
  250: 	F([flipp | flopp], foo, []),
  251:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} = (catch F([{flipp}], foo, [])),
  252:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {out,put}}, _}} = (catch F([], {out,put}, [])),
  253:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, not_an_option}, _}} =
  254: 	(catch F([], foo, [not_an_option])),
  255:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {format, foo}}, _}} =
  256: 	(catch F([], foo, {format,foo})),
  257:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {size,foo}}, _}} = (catch F([], foo, {size,foo})),
  258: 
  259:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {size, -1}}, _}} = (catch F([], foo, {size,-1})),
  260:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {no_files, foo}}, _}} =
  261: 	(catch F([], foo, {no_files,foo})),
  262:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {no_files, 1}}, _}} =
  263: 	(catch F([], foo, {no_files,1})),
  264:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, 1}, _}} = (catch F([], foo, {tmpdir,1})),
  265:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {order,1}}, _}} = (catch F([], foo, {order,1})),
  266:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {compressed, flopp}}, _}} =
  267: 	(catch F([], foo, {compressed,flopp})),
  268:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {unique,flopp}}, _}} =
  269: 	(catch F([], foo, {unique,flopp})),
  270:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {header,foo}}, _}} =
  271: 	(catch F([], foo, {header,foo})),
  272:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {header, 0}}, _}} =
  273: 	(catch F([], foo, {header,0})),
  274:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {header, 1 bsl 35}}, _}} =
  275: 	(catch F([], foo, {header,1 bsl 35})),
  276:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, header}, _}} =
  277: 	(catch F([], foo, [{header,1},{format,term}])),
  278: 
  279:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, not_an_option}, _}} =
  280: 	(catch KF(7, [], foo, [not_an_option])),
  281:     {'EXIT', {{badarg,format}, _}} =
  282: 	(catch KF(1, [], foo, [{format, binary}])),
  283:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, order}, _}} =
  284: 	(catch KF(1, [], foo, [{order, fun compare/2}])),
  285:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {flipp}}, _}} =
  286: 	(catch KF(2, [{flipp}], foo,[])),
  287:     {error,{file_error,AFlipp,enoent}} =
  288: 	KF(2, [flipp | flopp], foo,[]),
  289:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, {out, put}}, _}} =
  290: 	(catch KF(1, [], {out,put}, [])),
  291:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch KF(kp, [], foo, [])),
  292:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch KF([1, kp], [], foo, [])),
  293:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, kp}, _}} = (catch KF([1 | kp], [], foo, [])),
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: %% Sort terms on files.
  297: term_sort(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  298:     sort(term, [{compressed,false}], Config),
  299:     sort(term, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  300:     sort(term, [{order, ascending}, {compressed,true}], Config),
  301:     sort(term, [{order, descending}], Config),
  302:     ok.
  303: 
  304: %% Keysort terms on files.
  305: term_keysort(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  306:     keysort(term, [{tmpdir, ""}], Config),
  307:     keysort(term, [{order,descending}], Config),
  308:     ok.
  309: 
  310: %% Sort binary terms on files.
  311: binary_term_sort(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  312:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
  313:     sort({2, binary_term}, [], Config),
  314:     sort(binary_term, [{tmpdir, list_to_atom(PrivDir)}], Config),
  315:     sort(binary_term, [{tmpdir,PrivDir}], Config),
  316:     sort({3,binary_term}, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  317:     sort(binary_term, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  318:     sort(binary_term, [{order,descending}], Config),
  319:     ok.
  320: 
  321: %% Keysort binary terms on files.
  322: binary_term_keysort(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  323:     keysort({3, binary_term}, [], Config),
  324:     keysort(binary_term, [], Config),
  325:     keysort(binary_term, [{order,descending}], Config),
  326:     ok.
  327: 
  328: %% Sort binaries on files.
  329: binary_sort(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  330:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
  331:     sort({2, binary}, [], Config),
  332:     sort(binary, [{tmpdir, list_to_atom(PrivDir)}], Config),
  333:     sort(binary, [{tmpdir,PrivDir}], Config),
  334:     sort({3,binary}, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  335:     sort(binary, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  336:     sort(binary, [{order,descending}], Config),
  337:     ok.
  338: 
  339: %% Merge terms on files.
  340: term_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  341:     merge(term, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  342:     merge(term, [{order, ascending}, {compressed,true}], Config),
  343:     merge(term, [{order, descending}, {compressed,false}], Config),
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: %% Keymerge terms on files.
  347: term_keymerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     keymerge(term, [], Config),
  349:     keymerge(term, [{order, descending}], Config),
  350:     funmerge(term, [], Config),
  351:     ok.
  352: 
  353: %% Merge binary terms on files.
  354: binary_term_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  355:     merge(binary_term, [], Config),
  356:     merge({7, binary_term}, [], Config),
  357:     merge({3, binary_term}, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  358:     ok.
  359: 
  360: %% Keymerge binary terms on files.
  361: binary_term_keymerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  362:     keymerge({3, binary_term}, [], Config),
  363:     keymerge(binary_term, [], Config),
  364:     funmerge({3, binary_term}, [], Config),
  365:     funmerge(binary_term, [], Config),
  366:     ok.
  367: 
  368: %% Merge binaries on files.
  369: binary_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  370:     merge(binary, [], Config),
  371:     merge({7, binary}, [], Config),
  372:     merge({3, binary}, [{order, fun compare/2}], Config),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: %% Check terms on files.
  376: term_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  377:     check(term, Config),
  378:     ok.
  379: 
  380: %% Check binary terms on files.
  381: binary_term_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  382:     check(binary_term, Config),
  383:     ok.
  384: 
  385: %% Keycheck terms on files.
  386: term_keycheck(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  387:     keycheck(term, Config),
  388:     ok.
  389: 
  390: %% Keycheck binary terms on files.
  391: binary_term_keycheck(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  392:     keycheck(binary_term, Config),
  393:     ok.
  394: 
  395: %% Check binary terms on files.
  396: binary_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  397:     check(binary, Config),
  398:     ok.
  399: 
  400: %% Funs as input or output.
  401: inout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  402:     BTF = {format, binary_term},
  403:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  404: 
  405:     %% Input is fun.
  406:     End = fun(read) -> end_of_input end,
  407: 
  408:     IF1 = fun(read) -> {[1,7,5], End} end,
  409:     ok = file_sorter:sort(IF1, Foo, [{format, term}]),
  410:     %% 'close' is called, but the return value is caught and ignored.
  411:     IF2 = fun(read) -> {[1,2,3], fun(close) -> throw(ignored) end} end,
  412:     {error, bad_object} = file_sorter:sort(IF2, Foo, BTF),
  413: 
  414:     IF3 = fun(no_match) -> foo end,
  415:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} =
  416: 	(catch file_sorter:sort(IF3, Foo)),
  417:     IF4 = fun(read) -> throw(my_message) end,
  418:     my_message = (catch file_sorter:sort(IF4, Foo)),
  419:     IF5 = fun(read) -> {error, my_error} end,
  420:     {error, my_error} = file_sorter:sort(IF5, Foo),
  421: 
  422:     %% Output is fun.
  423:     {error, bad_object} =
  424: 	file_sorter:sort(IF2, fun(close) -> ignored end, BTF),
  425:     Args = [{format, term}],
  426:     {error, bad_object} =
  427: 	file_sorter:keysort(1, IF2, fun(close) -> ignored end, Args),
  428:     OF1 = fun(close) -> fine; (L) when is_list(L) -> fun(close) -> nice end end,
  429:     nice = file_sorter:sort(IF1, OF1, Args),
  430:     OF2 = fun(_) -> my_return end,
  431:     my_return = file_sorter:sort(IF1, OF2, Args),
  432:     OF3 = fun(_) -> throw(my_message) end,
  433:     my_message = (catch file_sorter:sort(IF1, OF3, Args)),
  434:     OF4 = fun(no_match) -> foo end,
  435:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} =
  436: 	(catch file_sorter:sort(IF1, OF4, Args)),
  437: 
  438:     P0 = pps(),
  439:     Fs1 = to_files([[3,1,2,5,4], [8,3,10]], term, Config),
  440:     error = file_sorter:sort(Fs1, fun(_) -> error end, Args),
  441:     delete_files(Fs1),
  442: 
  443:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  444: 
  445:     %% Passing a value from the input functions to the output functions.
  446:     IFV1 = fun(read) -> {end_of_input, 17} end,
  447:     OFV1 = fun({value, Value}) -> ofv(Value, []) end,
  448:     {17, []} = file_sorter:sort(IFV1, OFV1, Args),
  449: 
  450:     %% Output is not a fun. The value returned by input funs is ignored.
  451:     %% OTP-5009.
  452:     ok = file_sorter:sort(IFV1, Foo, [{format,term}]),
  453:     [] = from_files(Foo, term),
  454:     delete_files(Foo),
  455: 
  456:     ok.
  457: 
  458: ofv(Value, A) ->
  459:     fun(close) -> 
  460: 	    {Value, lists:append(lists:reverse(A))};
  461:        (L) when is_list(L) ->
  462: 	    ofv(Value, [L | A])
  463:     end.
  464: 
  465: %% Many temporary files.
  466: many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  467:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  468:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
  469:     P0 = pps(),
  470: 
  471:     Args = [{format, term}],
  472:     L1 = lists:map(fun(I) -> {one, two, three, I} end, lists:seq(1,1000)),
  473:     L2 = lists:map(fun(I) -> {four, five, six, I} end, lists:seq(1,1000)),
  474:     Fs2 = to_files([L1, L2], term, Config),
  475:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs2, Foo, [{size,1000} | Args]),
  476:     R = lists:sort(L1++L2),
  477:     R = from_files(Foo, term),
  478:     2000 = length(R),
  479:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs2, Foo, [{no_files,4},{size,1000} | Args]),
  480:     R = from_files(Foo, term),
  481:     ok =
  482: 	file_sorter:sort(Fs2, Foo, 
  483: 			 [{no_files,4},{size,1000},{order,descending} | Args]),
  484:     true = lists:reverse(R) =:= from_files(Foo, term),
  485:     ok =
  486: 	file_sorter:sort(Fs2, Foo, 
  487: 			 [{no_files,4},{size,1000},
  488: 			  {order,fun compare/2} | Args]),
  489:     R = from_files(Foo, term),
  490:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(4, Fs2, Foo,
  491: 			     [{no_files,4},{size,1000} | Args]),
  492:     RK = lists:keysort(4, L1++L2),
  493:     RK = from_files(Foo, term),
  494:     delete_files(Foo),
  495:     ok =
  496: 	file_sorter:keysort(4, Fs2, Foo, 
  497: 			    [{no_files,4},{size,1000},{order,descending} | Args]),
  498:     true = lists:reverse(RK) =:= from_files(Foo, term),
  499:     delete_files(Foo),
  500:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(4, Fs2, Foo,
  501: 			     [{size,500},{order,descending} | Args]),
  502:     true = lists:reverse(RK) =:= from_files(Foo, term),
  503:     delete_files(Foo),
  504:     error = file_sorter:sort(Fs2, fun(_) -> error end,
  505: 			     [{tmpdir, PrivDir}, {no_files,3},
  506: 			      {size,10000} | Args]),
  507: 
  508:     TmpDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "tmpdir"),
  509:     file:del_dir(TmpDir),
  510:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir),
  511:     case os:type() of
  512: 	{unix, _} ->
  513: 	    ok = file:change_mode(TmpDir, 8#0000),
  514: 	    {error, {file_error, _,_}} =
  515: 		file_sorter:sort(Fs2, fun(_M) -> foo end,
  516: 				 [{no_files,3},{size,10000},
  517: 				  {tmpdir,TmpDir} | Args]);
  518: 	_ ->
  519: 	    true
  520:     end,
  521:     ok = file:del_dir(TmpDir),
  522:     delete_files(Fs2),
  523:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  524:     ok.
  525: 
  526: %% Some other tests.
  527: misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  528:     BTF = {format, binary_term},
  529:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  530:     FFoo = filename:absname(Foo),
  531:     P0 = pps(),
  532: 
  533:     [File] = Fs1 = to_files([[1,3,2]], term, Config),
  534:     ok = file:write_file(Foo,<<>>),
  535:     case os:type() of
  536: 	{unix, _} ->
  537: 	    ok = file:change_mode(Foo, 8#0000),
  538: 	    {error,{file_error,FFoo,eacces}} =
  539: 		file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo, {format,term});
  540: 	_ ->
  541: 	    true
  542:     end,
  543:     file:delete(Foo),
  544:     NoBytes = 16, % RAM memory will never get this big, or?
  545:     ALot = (1 bsl (NoBytes*8)) - 1,
  546:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<ALot:NoBytes/unit:8,"foobar">>),
  547:     FFile = filename:absname(File),
  548:     {error, {bad_object,FFile}} =
  549:         file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo, [BTF, {header, 20}]),
  550:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<30:32,"foobar">>),
  551:     {error, {premature_eof, FFile}} = file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo, BTF),
  552:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<6:32,"foobar">>),
  553:     {error, {bad_object,FFile}} = file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo, BTF),
  554:     case os:type() of
  555: 	{unix, _} ->
  556: 	    ok = file:change_mode(File, 8#0000),
  557: 	    {error, {file_error,FFile,eacces}} =
  558: 		file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo),
  559: 	    {error, {file_error,FFile,eacces}} =
  560: 		file_sorter:sort(Fs1, Foo, {format, binary_term});
  561: 	_ ->
  562: 	    true
  563:     end,
  564:     delete_files(Fs1),
  565:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  566: 
  567:     %% bigger than chunksize
  568:     E1 = <<32000:32, 10:256000>>,
  569:     E2 = <<32000:32, 5:256000>>,
  570:     E3 = <<32000:32, 8:256000>>,
  571:     ok = file:write_file(Foo, [E1, E2, E3]),
  572:     ok = file_sorter:sort([Foo], Foo, [{format,binary},{size,10000}]),
  573:     ok = file_sorter:sort([Foo], Foo, [{format,fun(X) -> X end},
  574: 				       {size,10000}]),
  575:     Es = list_to_binary([E2,E3,E1]),
  576:     {ok, Es} = file:read_file(Foo),
  577:     delete_files(Foo),
  578:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  579: 
  580:     %% keysort more than one element
  581:     L = [{c,1,a},{c,2,b},{c,3,c},{b,1,c},{b,2,b},{b,3,a},{a,1,a},{a,2,b},
  582:          {a,3,c}],
  583:     Fs2 = to_files([L], binary_term, Config),
  584:     ok = file_sorter:keysort([2,3], Fs2, Foo, {format, binary_term}),
  585:     KS2_1 = from_files(Foo, binary_term),
  586:     KS2_2 = lists:keysort(2,lists:keysort(3, L)),
  587:     KS2_1 = KS2_2,
  588:     ok = file_sorter:keysort([2,3], Fs2, Foo,
  589: 			     [{format, binary_term},{size,5}]),
  590:     KS2_3 = from_files(Foo, binary_term),
  591:     KS2_3 = KS2_2,
  592:     ok = file_sorter:keysort([2,3,1], Fs2, Foo, {format, binary_term}),
  593:     KS3_1 = from_files(Foo, binary_term),
  594:     KS3_2 = lists:keysort(2, lists:keysort(3,lists:keysort(1, L))),
  595:     KS3_1 = KS3_2,
  596:     ok = file_sorter:keysort([2,3,1], Fs2, Foo,
  597: 			     [{format, binary_term},{size,5}]),
  598:     KS3_3 = from_files(Foo, binary_term),
  599:     KS3_3 = KS3_2,
  600:     delete_files([Foo | Fs2]),
  601:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  602: 
  603:     %% bigger than chunksize
  604:     %% Assumes that CHUNKSIZE = 16384. Illustrates that the Last argument
  605:     %% of merge_files/5 is necessary. 
  606:     EP1 = erlang:make_tuple(2728,foo),
  607:     EP2 = lists:duplicate(2729,qqq),
  608:     LL = [EP1, EP2, EP1, EP2, EP1, EP2],
  609:     Fs3 = to_files([LL], binary, Config),
  610:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs3, Foo, [{format,binary}, {unique,true}]),
  611:     [EP1,EP2] = from_files(Foo, binary),
  612:     delete_files(Foo),
  613:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs3, Foo,
  614: 			  [{format,binary_term}, {unique,true},
  615: 			   {size,30000}]),
  616:     [EP1,EP2] = from_files(Foo, binary_term),
  617:     delete_files([Foo | Fs3]),
  618: 
  619:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  620: 
  621:     BE1 = <<20000:32, 17:160000>>,
  622:     BE2 = <<20000:32, 1717:160000>>,
  623:     ok = file:write_file(Foo, [BE1,BE2,BE1,BE2]),
  624:     ok = file_sorter:sort([Foo], Foo, [{format,binary},
  625: 				       {size,10000},
  626: 				       {unique,true}]),
  627:     BEs = list_to_binary([BE1, BE2]),
  628:     {ok, BEs} = file:read_file(Foo),
  629:     delete_files(Foo),
  630:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  631: 
  632:     Fs4 = to_files([[7,4,1]], binary_term, Config),
  633:     {error, {bad_term, _}} = file_sorter:sort(Fs4, Foo, {format, term}),
  634:     delete_files([Foo | Fs4]),
  635:     true = P0 =:= pps(),
  636: 
  637:     ok.
  638: 
  639: %%% 
  640: %%% Utilities.
  641: %%% 
  642: 
  643: sort(Fmt, XArgs, Config) ->
  644:     Args = make_args(Fmt, [{size,5} | XArgs]),
  645:     TmpArgs = [{tmpdir,?privdir(Config)} | Args],
  646:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  647: 
  648:     %% Input is a fun. Output is a fun.
  649:     [] = file_sorter:sort(input([], 2, Fmt), output([], Fmt), Args),
  650:     L1 = [3,1,2,5,4],
  651:     S1 = file_sorter:sort(input(L1, 2, Fmt), output([], Fmt), TmpArgs),
  652:     S1 = rev(lists:sort(L1), TmpArgs),
  653: 
  654:     %% Input is a file. Output is a fun.
  655:     [] = file_sorter:sort([], output([], Fmt), Args),
  656:     L2 = [3,1,2,5,4],
  657:     Fs1 = to_files([L2], Fmt, Config),
  658:     S2 = file_sorter:sort(Fs1, output([], Fmt), TmpArgs),
  659:     S2 = rev(lists:sort(L2), TmpArgs),
  660:     delete_files(Fs1),
  661: 
  662:     %% Input is a file. Output is a file
  663:     ok = file_sorter:sort([], Foo, Args),
  664:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  665:     delete_files(Foo),
  666:     ok = file_sorter:sort([], Foo, [{unique,true} | Args]),
  667:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  668:     delete_files(Foo),
  669:     L3 = [3,1,2,5,4,6],
  670:     Fs2 = to_files([L3], Fmt, Config),
  671:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs2, Foo, Args),
  672:     true = rev(lists:sort(L3), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  673:     delete_files([Foo | Fs2]),
  674:     L4 = [1,3,4,1,2,5,4,5,6],
  675:     Fs3 = to_files([L4], Fmt, Config),
  676:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs3, Foo, Args++[{unique,true},
  677: 					   {size,100000}]),
  678:     true = rev(lists:usort(L4), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  679:     delete_files(Foo),
  680:     ok = file_sorter:sort(Fs3, Foo, Args++[{unique,true}]),
  681:     true = rev(lists:usort(L4), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  682:     delete_files([Foo | Fs3]),
  683: 
  684:     %% Input is a fun. Output is a file.
  685:     ok = file_sorter:sort(input([], 2, Fmt), Foo, Args),
  686:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  687:     delete_files(Foo),
  688:     L5 = [3,1,2,5,4,7],
  689:     ok = file_sorter:sort(input(L5, 2, Fmt), Foo, Args),
  690:     true = rev(lists:sort(L5), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  691:     delete_files(Foo),
  692: 
  693:     %% Removing duplicate keys.
  694:     KFun = key_compare(2),
  695:     L6 = [{5,e},{2,b},{3,c},{1,a},{4,d}] ++ [{2,c},{1,b},{4,a}],
  696:     KUArgs = lists:keydelete(order, 1, Args) ++ 
  697: 	[{unique, true}, {order, KFun},{size,100000}],
  698:     ok = file_sorter:sort(input(L6, 2, Fmt), Foo, KUArgs),
  699:     true = rev(lists:ukeysort(2, L6), KUArgs) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  700:     KArgs = lists:keydelete(unique, 1, KUArgs),
  701:     ok = file_sorter:sort(input(L6, 2, Fmt), Foo, KArgs),
  702:     true = rev(lists:keysort(2, L6), KArgs) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  703: 
  704:     %% Removing duplicate keys. Again.
  705:     KUArgs2 = lists:keydelete(order, 1, Args) ++ 
  706: 	[{unique, true}, {order, KFun},{size,5}],
  707:     ok = file_sorter:sort(input(L6, 2, Fmt), Foo, KUArgs2),
  708:     true = rev(lists:ukeysort(2, L6), KUArgs2) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  709:     KArgs2 = lists:keydelete(unique, 1, KUArgs2),
  710:     ok = file_sorter:sort(input(L6, 2, Fmt), Foo, KArgs2),
  711:     true = rev(lists:keysort(2, L6), KArgs2) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  712:     delete_files(Foo),
  713: 
  714:     ok.
  715: 
  716: keysort(Fmt, XArgs, Config) ->
  717:     Args = make_args(Fmt, [{size,50}, {no_files, 2} | XArgs]),
  718:     TmpArgs = Args ++ [{tmpdir,?privdir(Config)}],
  719:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  720: 
  721:     %% Input is files. Output is a file.
  722:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(2, [], Foo, Args),
  723:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  724:     delete_files(Foo),
  725:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(2, [], Foo, [{unique,true} | Args]),
  726:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  727:     delete_files(Foo),
  728:     L0 = [{a,2},{a,1},{a,2},{a,2},{a,1},{a,2},{a,2},{a,3}],
  729:     Fs0 = to_files([L0], Fmt, Config),
  730:     S = rev(lists:ukeysort(1, L0), Args),
  731:     ok =
  732: 	file_sorter:keysort(1, Fs0, Foo, Args ++ [{unique,true},
  733: 						  {size,100000}]),
  734:     S = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  735:     ok =
  736: 	file_sorter:keysort(1, Fs0, Foo, Args ++ [{unique,true},
  737: 						  {size,5}]),
  738:     S = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  739:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(1, Fs0, Foo, Args ++ [{unique,true}]),
  740:     S = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  741:     delete_files([Foo | Fs0]),
  742:     L11 = [{a,1,x4},{b,2,x4},{c,3,x4}],
  743:     L21 = [{a,1,x3},{b,2,x3},{c,3,x3}],
  744:     L31 = [{a,1,x2},{b,2,x2},{c,3,x2}],
  745:     L41 = [{a,1,x1},{b,2,x1},{c,3,x1}],
  746:     All = [L11, L21, L31, L41],
  747:     AllFlat = lists:append(All),
  748:     Sorted = rev(lists:keysort(2, AllFlat), Args),
  749:     Fs1 = to_files(All, Fmt, Config),
  750:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(2, Fs1, Foo, Args),
  751:     Sorted = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  752:     delete_files(Foo),
  753: 
  754:     %% Input is files. Output is a fun.
  755:     [] = file_sorter:keysort(2, [], output([], Fmt), Args),
  756:     KS1 = file_sorter:keysort(2, Fs1, output([], Fmt), TmpArgs),
  757:     Sorted = KS1,
  758:     delete_files(Fs1),
  759: 
  760:     %% Input is a fun. Output is a file.
  761:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(2, input([], 2, Fmt), Foo, Args),
  762:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  763:     delete_files(Foo),
  764:     ok = file_sorter:keysort(2, input(AllFlat, 4, Fmt), Foo, Args),
  765:     Sorted = from_files(Foo,  Fmt),
  766:     delete_files(Foo),
  767: 
  768:     %% Input is a fun. Output is a fun.
  769:     [] = file_sorter:keysort(2, input([], 2, Fmt), output([], Fmt),Args),
  770:     KS2 =
  771: 	file_sorter:keysort(2, input(AllFlat, 4, Fmt), output([], Fmt), 
  772: 			    TmpArgs),
  773:     Sorted = KS2,
  774:     ok.
  775: 
  776: merge(Fmt, XArgs, Config) ->
  777:     Args = make_args(Fmt, [{size,5} | XArgs]),
  778:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  779: 
  780:     %% Input is a file. Output is a fun.
  781:     [] = file_sorter:merge([], output([], Fmt), Args),
  782:     L2 = [[1,3,5],[2,4,5]],
  783:     Fs1 = to_files(L2, Fmt, Config),
  784:     S2 = file_sorter:sort(Fs1, output([], Fmt), Args),
  785:     S2 = rev(lists:sort(lists:append(L2)), Args),
  786:     delete_files(Fs1),
  787: 
  788:     %% Input is a file. Output is a file
  789:     ok = file_sorter:merge([], Foo, Args),
  790:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  791:     delete_files(Foo),
  792:     ok = file_sorter:merge([], Foo, [{unique,true} | Args]),
  793:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  794:     delete_files(Foo),
  795:     L31 = [1,2,3],
  796:     L32 = [2,3,4],
  797:     L33 = [4,5,6],
  798:     L3r = [L31, L32, L33],
  799:     L3 = [rev(L31,Args), rev(L32,Args), rev(L33,Args)],
  800:     Fs2 = to_files(L3, Fmt, Config),
  801:     ok = file_sorter:merge(Fs2, Foo, Args),
  802:     true = rev(lists:merge(L3r), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  803:     ok = file_sorter:merge(Fs2, Foo, Args++[{unique,true},
  804: 					    {size,100000}]),
  805:     true = rev(lists:umerge(L3r), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  806:     delete_files(Foo),
  807:     ok = file_sorter:merge(Fs2, Foo, Args++[{unique,true}]),
  808:     true = rev(lists:umerge(L3r), Args) =:= from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  809:     delete_files([Foo | Fs2]),
  810: 
  811:     ok.
  812: 
  813: keymerge(Fmt, XArgs, Config) ->
  814:     Args = make_args(Fmt, [{size,50}, {no_files, 2} | XArgs]),
  815:     Foo = outfile("foo", Config),
  816: 
  817:     %% Input is files. Output is a file.
  818:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, [], Foo, Args),
  819:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  820:     delete_files(Foo),
  821:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, [], Foo, [{unique,true} | Args]),
  822:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  823:     delete_files(Foo),
  824:     L0 = [rev([{a,1},{a,2}], Args), rev([{a,2},{a,1},{a,3}], Args)],
  825:     Fs0 = to_files(L0, Fmt, Config),
  826:     delete_files(Foo),
  827:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(1, Fs0, Foo, Args ++ [{unique,false}]),
  828:     S2 = rev([{a,1},{a,2},{a,2},{a,1},{a,3}], Args),
  829:     S2 = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  830:     delete_files([Foo | Fs0]),
  831:     L11 = [{a,1,x4},{b,2,x4},{c,3,x4}],
  832:     L21 = [{a,1,x3},{b,2,x3},{c,3,x3}],
  833:     L31 = [{a,1,x2},{b,2,x2},{c,3,x2}],
  834:     L41 = [{a,1,x1},{b,2,x1},{c,3,x1}],
  835:     All =
  836: 	[rev(L11, Args), rev(L21, Args), rev(L31, Args), rev(L41, Args)],
  837:     Merged1 = lists:keymerge(2, L11, L21),
  838:     Merged2 = lists:keymerge(2, L31, L41),
  839:     Merged = rev(lists:keymerge(2, Merged1, Merged2), Args),
  840:     Fs1 = to_files(All, Fmt, Config),
  841:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, Fs1, Foo, Args),
  842:     Merged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  843: 
  844:     fun() -> 
  845: 	    UArgs = [{unique,true} | Args],
  846: 	    UMerged1 = lists:ukeymerge(2, L11, L21),
  847: 	    UMerged2 = lists:ukeymerge(2, L31, L41),
  848: 	    UMerged = rev(lists:ukeymerge(2, UMerged1, UMerged2), Args),
  849: 	    ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, Fs1, Foo, UArgs),
  850: 	    UMerged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  851: 	    UArgs2 = make_args(Fmt, [{unique,true}, {size,50} | XArgs]),
  852: 	    ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, Fs1, Foo, UArgs2),
  853: 	    UMerged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  854: 	    List = rev([{a,1,x4},{b,2,x4},{c,3,x4}], Args),
  855: 	    FsL = to_files([List], Fmt, Config),
  856: 	    ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, FsL, Foo, UArgs),
  857: 	    List = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  858: 	    List1 = [{a,1,x4},{b,2,x4},{c,3,x4}],
  859: 	    List2 = [{a,3,x4},{b,4,x4},{c,5,x4}],
  860: 	    FsLL = to_files([rev(List1, Args), rev(List2, Args)], Fmt, Config),
  861: 	    ok = file_sorter:keymerge(2, FsLL, Foo, UArgs),
  862: 	    List1_2 = rev(lists:ukeymerge(2, List1, List2), Args),
  863: 	    List1_2 = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  864: 	    delete_files(Foo)
  865:     end(),
  866: 
  867:     %% Input is files. Output is a fun.
  868:     Fs3 = to_files(All, Fmt, Config),
  869:     [] = file_sorter:keysort(2, [], output([], Fmt), Args),
  870:     KS1 = file_sorter:keymerge(2, Fs3, output([], Fmt), Args),
  871:     Merged = KS1,
  872:     delete_files([Foo | Fs3]),
  873: 
  874:     L2 = [[{a,1}],[{a,2}],[{a,3}],[{a,4}],[{a,5}],[{a,6}],[{a,7}]],
  875:     Fs2 = to_files(L2, Fmt, Config),
  876:     M = file_sorter:keymerge(1, Fs2, output([], Fmt), Args),
  877:     M = rev(lists:append(L2), Args),
  878:     delete_files(Fs2),
  879: 
  880:     LL1 = [{d,4},{e,5},{f,6}],
  881:     LL2 = [{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}],
  882:     LL3 = [{j,10},{k,11},{l,12}],
  883:     LL4 = [{g,7},{h,8},{i,9}],
  884:     LL5 = [{p,16},{q,17},{r,18}],
  885:     LL6 = [{m,13},{n,14},{o,15}],
  886:     LLAll = [rev(LL1, Args),rev(LL2, Args),rev(LL3, Args),
  887: 	     rev(LL4, Args),rev(LL5, Args),rev(LL6, Args)],
  888:     FsLL6 = to_files(LLAll, Fmt, Config),
  889:     LL = rev(lists:sort(lists:append(LLAll)), Args),
  890:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(1, FsLL6, Foo, Args),
  891:     LL = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  892:     ok = file_sorter:keymerge(1, FsLL6, Foo, [{unique,true} | Args]),
  893:     LL = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  894:     delete_files([Foo | FsLL6]),
  895: 
  896:     ok.
  897: 
  898: funmerge(Fmt, XArgs, Config) ->
  899:     KComp = key_compare(2),
  900:     Args = make_args(Fmt, [{order,KComp},{size,5}, {no_files, 5} | XArgs]),
  901:     UArgs = [{unique,true} | Args],
  902:     Foo = outfile(foo, Config),
  903: 
  904:     EFs = to_files([[]], Fmt, Config),
  905:     ok = file_sorter:merge(EFs, Foo, UArgs),
  906:     [] = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  907:     delete_files([Foo | EFs]),
  908: 
  909:     L11 = [{a,1,x4},{b,2,x4},{c,3,x4}],
  910:     L21 = [{a,1,x3},{b,2,x3},{c,3,x3}],
  911:     L31 = [{a,1,x2},{b,2,x2},{c,3,x2}],
  912:     L41 = [{a,1,x1},{b,2,x1},{c,3,x1}],
  913:     CAll = [L11, L21, L31, L41],
  914:     CMerged1 = lists:merge(KComp, L11, L21),
  915:     CMerged2 = lists:merge(KComp, L31, L41),
  916:     CMerged = lists:merge(KComp, CMerged1, CMerged2),
  917:     CFs1 = to_files(CAll, Fmt, Config),
  918:     ok = file_sorter:merge(CFs1, Foo, Args),
  919:     CMerged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  920: 
  921:     Args4 = make_args(Fmt, [{size,50} | XArgs]),
  922:     ok = file_sorter:merge(CFs1, Foo, [{order,KComp} | Args4]),
  923:     CMerged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  924: 
  925:     UMerged1 = lists:umerge(KComp, L11, L21),
  926:     UMerged2 = lists:umerge(KComp, L31, L41),
  927:     UMerged = lists:umerge(KComp, UMerged1, UMerged2),
  928:     ok = file_sorter:merge(CFs1, Foo, [{order,KComp} | UArgs]),
  929:     UMerged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  930:     UArgs2 = 
  931:         lists:keydelete(order, 1,
  932:                         make_args(Fmt, [{unique,true}, {size,50} | XArgs])),
  933:     ok = file_sorter:merge(CFs1, Foo, [{order,KComp} | UArgs2]),
  934:     UMerged = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  935:     delete_files(Foo),
  936: 
  937:     List1 = [{a,1,x4},{b,2,x4},{c,3,x4}],
  938:     List2 = [{a,3,x4},{b,4,x4},{c,5,x4}],
  939:     List3 = [{a,5,x4},{b,6,x4},{c,7,x4}],
  940:     FsLL = to_files([List1, List2, List3], Fmt, Config),
  941:     ok = file_sorter:merge(FsLL, Foo, Args),
  942:     List1_2 = lists:merge(KComp,lists:merge(KComp,List1,List2),List3),
  943:     List1_2 = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  944:     ok = file_sorter:merge(FsLL, Foo, [{order,KComp} | UArgs]),
  945:     UList1_2 =
  946:         lists:umerge(KComp,lists:umerge(KComp, List1, List2),List3),
  947:     UList1_2 = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  948:     delete_files([Foo | CFs1]),
  949: 
  950:     fun() ->
  951: 	    LL1 = [{d,4},{e,5},{f,6}],
  952: 	    LL2 = [{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}],
  953: 	    LL3 = [{j,10},{k,11},{l,12}],
  954: 	    LL4 = [{g,7},{h,8},{i,9}],
  955: 	    LL5 = [{p,16},{q,17},{r,18}],
  956: 	    LL6 = [{m,13},{n,14},{o,15}],
  957: 	    LLAll = [LL1,LL2,LL3,LL4,LL5,LL6],
  958: 	    FsLL6 = to_files(LLAll, Fmt, Config),
  959: 	    LL = lists:sort(lists:append(LLAll)),
  960: 	    ok = file_sorter:merge(FsLL6, Foo, Args),
  961: 	    LL = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  962: 	    ok = file_sorter:merge(FsLL6, Foo, UArgs),
  963: 	    LL = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  964: 	    delete_files([Foo | FsLL6])
  965:     end(),
  966: 
  967:     fun() ->
  968: 	    RLL1 = [{b,2},{h,8},{n,14}],
  969: 	    RLL2 = [{a,1},{g,7},{m,13}],
  970: 	    RLL3 = [{d,4},{j,10},{p,16}],
  971: 	    RLL4 = [{c,3},{i,9},{o,15}],
  972: 	    RLL5 = [{f,6},{l,12},{r,18}],
  973: 	    RLL6 = [{e,5},{k,11},{q,17}],
  974: 	    RLLAll = [RLL1,RLL2,RLL3,RLL4,RLL5,RLL6],
  975: 	    RFsLL6 = to_files(RLLAll, Fmt, Config),
  976: 	    RLL = lists:sort(lists:append(RLLAll)),
  977: 	    ok = file_sorter:merge(RFsLL6, Foo, Args),
  978: 	    RLL = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  979: 	    ok = file_sorter:merge(RFsLL6, Foo, UArgs),
  980: 	    RLL = from_files(Foo, Fmt),
  981: 	    delete_files([Foo | RFsLL6])
  982:     end(),
  983: 
  984:     ok.
  985: 
  986: check(Fmt, Config) ->
  987:     Args0 = make_args(Fmt, [{size,5}]),
  988:     Args = Args0 ++ [{tmpdir,?privdir(Config)}],
  989: 
  990:     Fun = fun compare/2,
  991: 
  992:     L1 = [3,1,2,5,4],
  993:     [F1_0] = Fs1 = to_files([L1], Fmt, Config),
  994:     F1 = filename:absname(F1_0),
  995:     {ok, [{F1,2,1}]} = file_sorter:check(Fs1, Args),
  996:     {ok, [{F1,2,1}]} = file_sorter:check(Fs1, [{order,Fun} | Args]),
  997:     {ok, [{F1,2,1}]} = file_sorter:check(Fs1, [{unique,true} | Args]),
  998:     {ok, [{F1,2,1}]} =
  999: 	file_sorter:check(Fs1, [{order,Fun},{unique,true} | Args]),
 1000:     {ok, [{F1,3,2}]} =
 1001: 	file_sorter:check(Fs1, [{order,descending} | Args]),
 1002:     {ok, [{F1,3,2}]} =
 1003: 	file_sorter:check(Fs1, [{unique,true},{order,descending} | Args]),
 1004:     delete_files(Fs1),
 1005: 
 1006:     L2 = [[1,2,2,3,3,4,5,5],[5,5,4,3,3,2,2,1]],
 1007:     [F2_0,F3_0] = Fs2 = to_files(L2, Fmt, Config),
 1008:     F2 = filename:absname(F2_0),
 1009:     F3 = filename:absname(F3_0),
 1010:     {ok, [{F3,3,4}]} = file_sorter:check(Fs2, Args),
 1011:     {ok, [{F3,3,4}]} = file_sorter:check(Fs2, [{order,Fun} | Args]),
 1012:     {ok, [{F2,3,2},{F3,2,5}]} =
 1013: 	file_sorter:check(Fs2, [{unique, true} | Args]),
 1014:     {ok, [{F2,3,2},{F3,2,5}]} =
 1015: 	file_sorter:check(Fs2, [{order,Fun},{unique, true} | Args]),
 1016:     {ok, [{F2,2,2}]} =
 1017: 	file_sorter:check(Fs2, [{order,descending} | Args]),
 1018:     {ok, [{F2,2,2},{F3,2,5}]} =
 1019: 	file_sorter:check(Fs2, [{unique,true},{order,descending} | Args]),
 1020:     delete_files(Fs2),
 1021: 
 1022:     L3 = [1,2,3,4],
 1023:     Fs3 = to_files([L3], Fmt, Config),
 1024:     {ok, []} = file_sorter:check(Fs3, [{unique,true} | Args]),
 1025:     {ok, []} =
 1026: 	file_sorter:check(Fs3, [{unique,true},{order,Fun} | Args]),
 1027:     delete_files(Fs3),
 1028: 
 1029:     %% big objects
 1030:     T1 = erlang:make_tuple(10000,foo),
 1031:     T2 = erlang:make_tuple(10000,bar),
 1032:     L4 = [T1,T2],
 1033:     [FF_0] = Fs4 = to_files([L4], Fmt, Config),
 1034:     FF = filename:absname(FF_0),
 1035:     {ok, [{FF,2,T2}]} = file_sorter:check(Fs4, [{unique,true} | Args]),
 1036:     delete_files(Fs4),
 1037: 
 1038:     CFun = key_compare(2),
 1039:     L10 = [[{1,a},{2,b},T10_1={1,b},{3,c}], [{1,b},T10_2={2,a}]],
 1040:     [F10_0,F11_0] = Fs10 = to_files(L10, Fmt, Config),
 1041:     F10_1 = filename:absname(F10_0),
 1042:     F11_1 = filename:absname(F11_0),
 1043:     {ok, [{F10_1,3,T10_1},{F11_1,2,T10_2}]} =
 1044:         file_sorter:check(Fs10, [{unique,true},{order,CFun} | Args]),
 1045:     delete_files(Fs10),
 1046: 
 1047:     ok.
 1048: 
 1049: keycheck(Fmt, Config) ->
 1050:     Args0 = make_args(Fmt, [{size,5}]),
 1051:     Args = Args0 ++ [{tmpdir,?privdir(Config)}],
 1052: 
 1053:     L1 = [[{a,1},{b,2}], [{c,2},{b,1},{a,3}]],
 1054:     [F1_0,F2_0] = Fs1 = to_files(L1, Fmt, Config),
 1055:     F1 = filename:absname(F1_0),
 1056:     F2 = filename:absname(F2_0),
 1057:     {ok, [{F2,2,{b,1}}]} = file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs1, Args),
 1058:     {ok, [{F2,2,{b,1}}]} =
 1059: 	file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs1, [{unique,true} | Args]),
 1060:     {ok, [{F1,2,{b,2}}]} =
 1061: 	file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs1, [{order,descending},{unique,true} | Args]),
 1062:     delete_files(Fs1),
 1063: 
 1064:     L2 = [[{a,1},{a,2},{a,2},{b,2}], [{c,2},{b,1},{b,2},{b,2},{a,3}]],
 1065:     [F3_0,F4_0] = Fs2 = to_files(L2, Fmt, Config),
 1066:     F3 = filename:absname(F3_0),
 1067:     F4 = filename:absname(F4_0),
 1068:     {ok, [{F4,2,{b,1}}]} = file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs2, Args),
 1069:     {ok, [{F3,2,{a,2}},{F4,2,{b,1}}]} =
 1070: 	file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs2, [{unique,true} | Args]),
 1071:     {ok, [{F3,4,{b,2}}]} =
 1072: 	file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs2, [{order,descending} | Args]),
 1073:     {ok, [{F3,2,{a,2}},{F4,3,{b,2}}]} =
 1074: 	file_sorter:keycheck(1, Fs2, 
 1075: 			     [{order,descending},{unique,true} | Args]),
 1076:     delete_files(Fs2),
 1077: 
 1078:     ok.
 1079: 
 1080: rev(L, Args) ->
 1081:     case lists:member({order, descending}, Args) of
 1082: 	true ->
 1083: 	    lists:reverse(L);
 1084: 	false ->
 1085: 	    L
 1086:     end.
 1087: 
 1088: make_args({HL, Fmt}, Args) ->
 1089:     make_args(Fmt, [{header, HL} | Args]);
 1090: make_args(Fmt, Args) ->
 1091:     [{format, Fmt} | Args].
 1092: 
 1093: compare(X, Y) ->
 1094:     X =< Y.
 1095: 
 1096: key_compare(I) ->
 1097:     fun(X, Y) -> 
 1098:             element(I, bin_to_term(X)) =< element(I, bin_to_term(Y))
 1099:     end.
 1100: 
 1101: bin_to_term(B) when is_binary(B) -> binary_to_term(B);
 1102: bin_to_term(T) -> T.
 1103: 
 1104: -define(CHUNKSIZE, 8096).
 1105: 
 1106: pps() ->
 1107:     erlang:ports().
 1108: 
 1109: input(L, N, term) ->
 1110:     input(L, N);
 1111: input(L, N, {_HL, Format}) when Format =:= binary_term; Format =:= binary ->
 1112:     binput(L, N);
 1113: input(L, N, Format) when Format =:= binary_term; Format =:= binary ->
 1114:     binput(L, N).
 1115: 
 1116: binput(L, N) ->
 1117:     Bs = lists:map(fun(T) -> term_to_binary(T) end, L),
 1118:     input(Bs, N).
 1119: 
 1120: input(L, N) ->
 1121:     fun(close) ->
 1122: 	    ok;
 1123:        (read) ->
 1124: 	    case L of
 1125: 		[] -> end_of_input;
 1126: 		_ ->
 1127: 		    R = lists:sublist(L, N),
 1128: 		    NL = lists:nthtail(length(R), L),
 1129: 		    {R, input(NL, N)}
 1130: 	    end
 1131:     end.
 1132: 
 1133: output(L, term) ->
 1134:     output(L);
 1135: output(L, {_HL, Format}) when Format =:= binary_term; Format =:= binary ->
 1136:     boutput(L);
 1137: output(L, Format) when Format =:= binary_term; Format =:= binary ->
 1138:     boutput(L).
 1139: 
 1140: output(A) ->
 1141:     fun(close) -> 
 1142: 	    lists:append(lists:reverse(A));
 1143:        (L) when is_list(L) ->
 1144: 	    output([L | A])
 1145:     end.
 1146: 
 1147: boutput(A) ->
 1148:     fun(close) -> 
 1149: 	    Bs = lists:append(lists:reverse(A)),
 1150: 	    lists:map(fun(B) -> binary_to_term(B) end, Bs);
 1151:        (L) when is_list(L) ->
 1152: 	    boutput([L | A])
 1153:     end.
 1154: 
 1155: outfile(Name, Config) ->
 1156:     list_to_atom(filename:join(?privdir(Config), Name)).
 1157: 
 1158: %% [[term()]] -> [filename()]
 1159: to_files(Lists, term, Config) ->
 1160:     terms_to_files(Lists, Config);
 1161: to_files(Lists, Format, Config) when Format =:= binary_term; 
 1162: 				     Format =:= binary ->
 1163:     bins_to_files(Lists, 4, Config);
 1164: to_files(Lists, {HL, Format}, Config) when Format =:= binary_term; 
 1165: 					   Format =:= binary ->
 1166:     bins_to_files(Lists, HL, Config).
 1167: 
 1168: %% [[term()]] -> [filename()]
 1169: terms_to_files(Lists, Config) ->
 1170:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
 1171:     terms_to_files(Lists, PrivDir, 1).
 1172: 
 1173: terms_to_files([L | Ls], PrivDir, N) ->
 1174:     F = lists:concat([?MODULE, '_', N]),
 1175:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, F),
 1176:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
 1177:     write_terms(Fd, L),
 1178:     file:close(Fd),
 1179:     [list_to_atom(File) | terms_to_files(Ls, PrivDir, N+1)];
 1180: terms_to_files([], _PrivDir, _N) ->
 1181:     [].
 1182: 
 1183: write_terms(Fd, [T | Ts]) ->
 1184:     io:format(Fd, "~p.~n", [T]),
 1185:     write_terms(Fd, Ts);
 1186: write_terms(_Fd, []) ->
 1187:     ok.
 1188: 
 1189: %% [[term()]] -> [filename()]
 1190: bins_to_files(Lists, HL, Config) ->
 1191:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Config),
 1192:     bins_to_files(Lists, PrivDir, 1, HL).
 1193: 
 1194: bins_to_files([L | Fs], PrivDir, N, HL) ->
 1195:     F = lists:concat([?MODULE, '_', N]),
 1196:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, F),
 1197:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [raw,binary,write]),
 1198:     write_bins(Fd, L, HL),
 1199:     file:close(Fd),
 1200:     [list_to_atom(File) | bins_to_files(Fs, PrivDir, N+1, HL)];
 1201: bins_to_files([], _PrivDir, _N, _HL) ->
 1202:     [].
 1203: 
 1204: write_bins(Fd, [T | Ts], HL) ->
 1205:     B = term_to_binary(T),
 1206:     Sz = byte_size(B),
 1207:     ok = file:write(Fd, [<<Sz:HL/unit:8>>, B]),
 1208:     write_bins(Fd, Ts, HL);
 1209: write_bins(_Fd, [], _HL) ->
 1210:     ok.
 1211: 
 1212: %% [filename()] -> [[term()]] or filename() -> [term()]
 1213: from_files(Files, term) ->
 1214:     terms_from_files(Files);
 1215: from_files(Files, Format) when Format =:= binary_term; Format =:= binary ->
 1216:     bins_from_files(Files, 4);
 1217: from_files(Files, {HL, Format}) when Format =:= binary_term; 
 1218:                                      Format =:= binary ->
 1219:     bins_from_files(Files, HL).
 1220: 
 1221: %% [filename()] -> [[term()]] or filename() -> [term()]
 1222: terms_from_files(File) when is_atom(File) ->
 1223:     [Terms] = terms_from_files([File]),
 1224:     Terms;
 1225: terms_from_files(Files) ->
 1226:     lists:map(fun(F) -> terms_from_file(F) end, Files).
 1227: 
 1228: terms_from_file(File) ->
 1229:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,compressed]),
 1230:     terms_from_file(Fd, []).
 1231: 
 1232: terms_from_file(Fd, L) ->
 1233:     case io:read(Fd, '') of
 1234: 	{ok, Term} ->
 1235: 	    terms_from_file(Fd, [Term | L]);
 1236: 	eof ->
 1237: 	    file:close(Fd),
 1238: 	    lists:reverse(L)
 1239:     end.
 1240: 
 1241: %% [filename()] -> [[term()]]
 1242: bins_from_files(File, HL) when is_atom(File) ->
 1243:     [Bins] = bins_from_files([File], HL),
 1244:     Bins;
 1245: bins_from_files(Files, HL) ->
 1246:     lists:map(fun(F) -> collect(F, HL) end, Files).
 1247: 
 1248: delete_files(File) when is_atom(File) ->
 1249:     file:delete(File);
 1250: delete_files(Files) ->
 1251:     lists:foreach(fun(F) -> file:delete(F) end, Files).
 1252: 
 1253: %%%
 1254: %%% Collects binaries converted to terms in a list. Not very efficient.
 1255: %%%
 1256: collect(F, HL) ->
 1257:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(F, [read, binary, raw, compressed]),
 1258:     R = (catch c(Fd, <<>>, 0, ?CHUNKSIZE, HL, [])),
 1259:     file:close(Fd),
 1260:     R.
 1261: 
 1262: c(Fd, Bin0, Size0, NoBytes, HL, L) ->
 1263:     case file:read(Fd, NoBytes) of
 1264: 	{ok, Bin} ->
 1265: 	    Size = Size0 + byte_size(Bin),
 1266: 	    NBin = list_to_binary([Bin0, Bin]),
 1267: 	    c1(Fd, NBin, Size, HL, L);
 1268: 	eof when Size0 =:= 0 ->
 1269: 	    lists:reverse(L);
 1270:         eof ->
 1271: 	    ct:fail({error, premature_eof});
 1272: 	Error ->
 1273: 	    ct:fail(Error)
 1274:     end.
 1275: 
 1276: c1(Fd, B, BinSize, HL, L) -> 
 1277:     case B of 
 1278: 	<<Size:HL/unit:8, Bin/binary>> ->
 1279: 	    if 
 1280: 		Size > BinSize - HL, Size > ?CHUNKSIZE ->
 1281: 		    c(Fd, B, BinSize, Size + HL, HL, L);
 1282: 		Size > BinSize - HL ->
 1283: 		    c(Fd, B, BinSize, ?CHUNKSIZE, HL, L);
 1284: 		true ->
 1285: 		    <<BinTerm:Size/binary, R/binary>> = Bin,	    
 1286: 		    E = case catch binary_to_term(BinTerm) of
 1287:                             {'EXIT', _} ->
 1288: 				ct:fail({error, bad_object});
 1289: 			    Term ->
 1290: 				Term
 1291: 			end,
 1292: 		    NBinSize = BinSize - HL - Size,
 1293: 		    c1(Fd, R, NBinSize, HL, [E | L])
 1294: 	    end;
 1295: 	_ ->
 1296: 	    c(Fd, B, BinSize, ?CHUNKSIZE, HL, L)
 1297:     end.
